description: A comfy tee with a groovy graphic, the Men’s Merino Sport 150 Overland Trek Short Sleeve tee gives you the benefits of responsibly sourced Merino wool—temperature regulation, moisture management, and odor control—with the durability and faster dry times of polyester. Plus, it’s designed with other comfort features, including offset shoulder seams and flatlock seams to help prevent chafing, as well as a fit that’s built for movement. With softness that just won’t quit, this tee is as ready for your next outdoor barbeque as it is for an afternoon at the gym.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Overland Trek SS Graphic Tee - Mens
